job_title: Veterinary Hospital Manager in Savannah, GA
pros: This employer goes above and beyond to ensure that their staff has a good work/life balance and is truly invested in the wellbeing of the hospital!
cons: Minimal parking but plans to extend property for parking and add on extension of hospital.

job_title: Animal Care Assistant in Savannah, GA
pros: Great coworkers, loved my fellow animal care assistants. Always felt taken care of by supervisors. Everyone was very willing to teach and train! They are very open to giving growth opportunities.
cons: Vets/vet techs can be a bit condescending at times. Hours are long and you have to work some weekends.

pros: Family atmosphere, extremely collaborative, strong support team, high quality medicine, great clientele, leadership supports opportunity for growth across all departments
cons: does not currently offer health insurance

review_title: Under paid with no chance of promotion
pros: Veterinarians genuinely care about their patients and practice modern medicine
cons: The owner allows management to play favorites and ostracize employees while turning a blind eye.

pros: Ethical, family owned company. Practices excellent medicine and is highly involved in continuing education, training, and hiring wonderful team members.
cons: Can be fast paced, and somewhat stressful during the busy summer season.
